dataset_information.missing_data: Exposure time occurring more than 22 years before surveys discarded
dataset_information.data_collection_method: Retrospective reports, full birth histories, maternal sibling group data
dataset_information.data_cleaning: Fitting models to minimize generalized cross-validation (GCV) score

usage_in_paper.specifics: Used to analyze trends and patterns in child and adult mortality in sub-Saharan Africa

study_context.study_title: Divergences in Trends in Child and Adult Mortality in Sub-Saharan Africa: Survey Evidence on the Survival of Children and Siblings

authors.name: Georges Reniers
affiliations: London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine

dependent_variables.name: Adult mortality rates (45q15)
dependent_variables.measurement: Probability of dying between ages 15 and 60
